title: Effect of increase in real interest rates in US

content.question: If real interest rates in the United States increase relative to the rest of the world, which of the following will occur?

choices.label: Domestic private investment in plant and equipment will increase.
The supply of United States dollars in the foreign exchange market will increase.
The demand for United States dollars in the foreign exchange market will increase.
Net exports in the United States will increase.
The United States capital and financial account will be in deficit.

content.answer: The demand for United States dollars in the foreign exchange market will increase.

topic.text: 6.6: Real Interest Rates and International Capital Flows

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
